articles.description: UEFA are planning to radically restructure European football from 2024 onwards which could impact Man United.
articles.content:
The Premier League are discussing proposals by UEFA that could see six English clubs qualify for the Champions League.
Under UEFA's plans to restructure European competition, 36 clubs would play in … [+2786 chars]

articles.author: Darren Wells
articles.title: Odion Ighalo signs for new club after Man Utd loan spell fizzles out - Mirror Online
articles.description: Ighalo spent a year at Old Trafford after being signed on deadline day in January last year but his departure came with little fanfare after he had been edged out of the first-team picture
articles.content:
Odion Ighalo has a new club after his loan spell at Manchester United fizzled out. 
The Nigerian forward has signed for Saudi Arabian side Al Shabab on a two-and-a-half year deal.
Ighalo was on the… [+1977 chars]

articles.title: Lewis Hamilton's contract saga with Mercedes has become 'embarrassing', claims Ralf Schumacher - Daily Mail
articles.description: Hamilton is currently a free agent, having seen his previous £40million-a-year Mercedes deal expire at the end of December as both parties struggled to find a middle ground in their negotiations.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton has been urged to back down in his contract stand off with Mercedes by Ralf Schumacher.

articles.title: David Luiz opens up on "reality" Arsenal are facing after Wolves defeat - Mirror Online
articles.description: David Luiz was sent off in Arsenal's defeat at Wolves which leaves them in midtable but the defender has not given up on winning silverware this season
articles.content:
Arsenal need to be wise to the "difficult reality" of the Premier League as they sit in midtable.
